text: Madeline is a French-Canadian television series produced by France Animation, And Nelvana Limited part of the Madeline media franchise about the character Madeline Fogg. It began as a series of six television specials from 1988 to 1991, and then was continued as Madeline and The New Adventures of Madeline from 1993 to 2001. ==References== Category:1993 American television series debuts Category:2001 American television series endings Category:1993 Canadian television series debuts Category:2001 Canadian television series endings
title: Madeline (TV series)
